data.title: Hassan Ghul Archives
data.meta_description: There is not much known about Hassan Ghul, the alleged conduit whose information led to the killing of former al-Qaeda leader Osama Bin Laden in Pakistan. The mysterious Hassan Ghul was an important al-Qaeda facilitator, financier and messenger of Pakistani descent with Saudi residency. Ghul mostly operated inside of Afghanistan and Pakistan, but also flew to Saudi Arabia to finance â€¦
